name: Sick Feud
description:
In a boring and peaceful place in the body, lives happy but boring life of the cells. One day, you and the uninvited germs enters the body to show  a little fun by wrecking  full havoc. Show the cells  its "TRUE COLORS" of your flitty hands what they're made of.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

Use the mouse and click the Germ beaker to spawn in your pals to fight off cells.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
